text: Vony budut聞 krychaty tam, "Nash Lord, yakshcho vy otrymuyete nas z tut, my popratsyuyemo righteousness, zamist聞 prats聞 my zvychayno robyly .' My ne daly vam dovichnyy-dovhyy shans, z bezperervnym reminders dlya tsykh khto by vzyav uvahu? Vy ne otrymaly warner? Tomu, smak (naslidky). Porushnyky budut聞 ne maty dopomohty yim
